entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast early this evening. Wind becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
